mapper.update: update job set (job_name = #{job.jobName}, job_money = #{job.jobMoney}, job_req = #{job.jobReq}, job_location = #{jobLocation}, recruiter_name = #{job.recruiterName}, recruiter_phone = #{job.recruiterPhone}, job_need = #{jobNeed}, job_tags = {job.jobTags}, update_time = now()) where job_id = {job.jobId}
